'''''The Tolkien Professor''''' is the name of a podcast and website created by [[Corey Olsen]]. [[Riddles in the Dark (podcast)|Riddles in the Dark]], a podcast about the forthcoming [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' (film series)]], forms part of this podcast series.
